name: Tic Tac Die
description:
Tic Tac Die is a small iteration on Tic Tac Toe where you fight your enemas using the 100% luck based gameplay of Tic Tac Toe.

Have Fun and share your opinion on the game via the comments and the rating system.

Details
  • 1280 x 720 Window Size.
  • Pixel Art.
  • Made with Monogame.
Gameplay

You press the Left mouse button on the desired location to draw the X and wait until the AI draws his O.

note: the Ai may take his time to decide.
